content: crochet tarantula is a scrap yarn project these make lovely halloween decorations you can also crochet the tarantula with hairy fiber yarn and make your handmade creations more realistic instructions in this document are given for two-colored tarantula made with acrylic yarn i hope you will crochet this along with me finished size my finished size using worsted weight yarn and 4 5 mm crochet hook was 6 inches long and 10 inches wide gauge not critical materials yarn worsted weight yarn i used red heart super saver yarn in charcoal gray and big twist value worsted yarn in burnt orange orange you can substitute any yarn for this pattern and go down 1- 2 hook sizes from yarn recommendation hook 4 5 mm crochet hook stitch markers scissors yarn needle 10 mm safety eyes or black yarn and needle polyester fiberfill pipe cleaners - 8 optional i hope you will crochet this along with me
